sections.paragraph: அல்லது, அப்படியானால், ஆவது, ஆகிலும், ஆல், ஆகில், உம், மேலும் - இணைப்பு இடைச்சொல்
a) implying that the latter choice is preferred
b) or if, introducing an example to be seen under a particular principle
2) whether, not the least, if, otherwise, also, and, then

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: The first form is presumed to be the “constructive” or genitival form of the second form which is short for H185; desire (and so probably in Pro 31:4); hence (by way of alternative) or, also if: - also, and, either, if, at the least, X nor, or, otherwise, then, whether.
Cognate: H176, H177, H183, H185, H189, H3970, H8378
